body_html:
gcloud ml-engine local train \
    --package-path trainer \
    --module-name trainer.task \
    --job-dir ${job_dir} \
    --distributed \
    -- \
    --train_files ${train_files} \
    --eval_files ${eval_files} \
    --hidden_units ${hidden_units} \
    --cats_path ${cats_path} \
    --job_dir ${job_dir} \
    --train_batch_size ${train_batch_size} \
    --eval_batch_size ${eval_batch_size} \
    --train_set_size ${train_set_size} \
    --num_epochs ${num_epochs}

Caned estimator, trainning and eval data in tfrecord format. That's all.
training data size(train_set_size) is about 300M, train_batch_size=512, eval_batch_size=250, num_epochs=4.
body_text:
gcloud ml-engine local train \

    --train_batch_size ${train_batch_size} \

    --train_set_size ${train_set_size} \
    --num_epochs ${num_epochs}

Caned estimator, trainning and eval data in tfrecord format. That's all.
training data size(train_set_size) is about 300M, train_batch_size=512, eval_batch_size=250, num_epochs=4.
body:
```
gcloud ml-engine local train \
    --package-path trainer \
    --module-name trainer.task \
    --job-dir ${job_dir} \
    --distributed \
    -- \
    --train_files ${train_files} \
    --eval_files ${eval_files} \
    --hidden_units ${hidden_units} \
    --cats_path ${cats_path} \
    --job_dir ${job_dir} \
    --train_batch_size ${train_batch_size} \
    --eval_batch_size ${eval_batch_size} \
    --train_set_size ${train_set_size} \
    --num_epochs ${num_epochs}
```
Caned estimator, trainning and eval data in tfrecord format. That's all.
training data size(train_set_size) is about 300M, train_batch_size=512, eval_batch_size=250, num_epochs=4.
